marklogic.body: great points but honestly who cares, women are fucking morons and this site is just proof of how ignorant these bitches really are. This site is karma for all the fucking Headaches that women give men. I don't think guys who get posted on here care, but it's fitting that as self-conscious as women are, they finally have all their shit laid out for everyone to see. honestly, I think this site is needed to take these bitches down quite a few pegs. women spout Off about how they feel judged and objectified, but i think deep down they enjoy the thrill. If they didn't, then why would they be sending pics in the first place? If some of these girls really are respectable, then they would never consider taking nude photos of themselves and sending to people, or at least not be surprised when that shit lands on IAU.
